description: Updates a mobile device access rule for the specified WorkMail organization.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The WorkMail organization under which the rule will be updated.

parameters.name: MobileDeviceAccessRuleId
parameters.description: The identifier of the rule to be updated.

parameters.name: Effect
parameters.description: The effect of the rule when it matches. Allowed values are ALLOW or DENY.

parameters.name: DeviceTypes
parameters.description: Device types that the updated rule will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: NotDeviceTypes
parameters.description: Device types that the updated rule will not match. All other device types will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: DeviceModels
parameters.description: Device models that the updated rule will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: NotDeviceModels
parameters.description: Device models that the updated rule will not match. All other device models will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: DeviceOperatingSystems
parameters.description: Device operating systems that the updated rule will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: NotDeviceOperatingSystems
parameters.description: Device operating systems that the updated rule will not match. All other device operating systems will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: DeviceUserAgents
parameters.description: User agents that the updated rule will match. (string) ---

parameters.name: NotDeviceUserAgents
parameters.description: User agents that the updated rule will not match. All other user agents will match. (string) ---
